Carbon footprint kgCO₂ -- kgCO₂
Expenses kr The costs are a sum of your energy costs, your car fuel costs and the fixed costs your car produces, like insurance and value depreciation.
Calories kCal Your calorie consumption. The more you walk or cycle instead of driving, the more you will burn.
Active minutes min Active minutes are minutes during the day that you are not sitting still. It is recommended that you are active for at least 30 minutes each day.
Energy consumption kWh The total amount of energy/heat your house needs in kWh. The outside temperature determines how much heat you will need to keep it warm.
Driving distance km This is the average distance you have driven in the given period.

Carbon footprint
Transportation
Energy consumption
The type of energy you use for heating and the efficiency of your heating system determine 80% of your carbon footprint from energy consumption. The building year and the year of the last renovation of the house, also affect the housing emissions. Your vehicle is a major source of greenhouse gas emissions. Cycling or walking instead of driving will save you money, give you health benefits, and reduce your carbon footprint. Finally, to monitor your health gains
Home Screen NEXT SKIP GOT IT
Welcome! By 2030 greenhouse gas emissions will have to be cut by 40%.
Energy consumption and transport contribute over one half of total greenhouse gas emissions.
But they are also the easiest to control.
This app helps you monitor the emissions produced by your energy consumption and your driving.
Try and see if you can reduce your daily emissions by 40%.
The app will show you how much this can cost you or how much you can actually save doing it.
Enjoy!

Terms and Conditions The app will use the GPS on your device to track how you move, but before the data are stored, it will be anonymized and it should not be possible to track you personally with the app stored by the app. By clicking \'I AGREE\' below, you allow this app to store; - information about you that you explicit gave during registration, - GPS data generated from using the app, and allow secondary use of the information to e.g., city planning, mapping of citizens\' transportation habits. Since the main functionality of the app is to calculate your emissions through transportation, agreeing to these terms and conditions is necessary for the app to work optimally. I AGREE
